scenario_text.value: *sigh*
Hey, Shuuji. Something on your mind?
Oh, I’m just worried about our food supply.
I see.
We need to make it through this.
And we need to have enough to eat.
That’s right, Shuuji! Food is important!
Yeah. I need to check everywhere.

(Shuuji’s really turned around. He seems even
more trustworthy now.)
(Does he need help? Should I ask?)
(Hang on. Is all your stuff ready?)
Oh, Shuuji...
You’re really taking charge.
I’ll help.
Are you ready?
You’re really taking charge.

Um, you’re really taking charge.
There’s a leader vibe there.
What now, all of a sudden? Knock it off...
I’m sorry. I’m glad you said that, of course.

I gave up on other people’s expectations.
I decided to focus on what I need to do.
Shuuji...

And I’m not used to compliments.
It kinda makes me squirm a little.
Shuuji? Why are you squirming?
Ahaha! That’s the Shuuji I know!
I’ll help.
I’ll help. What do you need?
Thanks. That’s awesome.

Can you check how much food everyone has? If
someone’s running low, we’ll give them more.
Got it. I’ll let everyone know.
Are you ready?
Is your stuff all ready?
Oh no!
You forgot...
I’m an idiot. I haven’t started that yet.

It’s okay, Shuuji! I’ll help. We can do it
together!

Thanks, Lopmon. Perfect timing, too.
Let’s gather the food we can take with us.
Right!

I’ll stay here a bit longer. You should
finish getting ready too, Takuma.

All ready? I’m good to go.
Let me know when we’re heading out.
